name: Ħarmless
description:
In Ħarmless, you wander as Victor, one of Frakensteins many experiments, having to find your way back to his hidden tower outside of the city. Coming to terms with the fault in your making, you need to traverse through the obstacles before you, using the very same imperfection that got you disposed to now help you on the way.

Created by a team of 6 for the GJL Game Parade Summer 2021.

Caelan Quarrier, Zander Preston – 3D Artists

Tony Luu, Aayush Mathur– Programmers

Victor Ceresa – Sound

Laura Lukovics – 2D Artist
